title: Alina Sassy Pants Fisher
subtitle:
I am an ecologist who:
-was a refugee (my earliest memories are life in refugee camps)
-6th grade teacher told my parents I was “retarded”
-returned to grad school after 15 years, as a working mom
-was a professional belly dancer
-tripped over my dog & broke my arm at 13 pic.twitter.com/D67PMVtyjH

subtitle: Gospel: "For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them." title: Jean-Nicolas Beuze
subtitle:
